title: Divya Pearl and Diamond Haaram Set - A Timeless Telugu Bride's Treasure
materials: Emerald. Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a classic floral design intricately set with dazzling diamonds. A central ruby adds a touch of regal color, leading to a grand pendant featuring an emerald center. Delicate pearl drops enhance the elegance. The matching Jhumka earrings complement the necklace perfectly.
colors: with vibrant accents of red (ruby) and green (emerald). The pearls offer a soft
occasions: and other grand celebrations. This set is also perfect for special occasions where you want to make a statement of timeless elegance.
description: This Haaram Set is a testament to traditional Telugu craftsmanship and contemporary design sensibilities. The high-quality diamonds and gemstones are carefully selected and expertly set to maximize brilliance. A true heirloom piece, symbolizing prosperity and beauty.
